title: Men Leather Strap Watches Men's Chronograph Waterproof Sport Date Quartz Wrist watch

leather watchband and alloy case with Push Button Hidden Clasp, no any hurt of your clothes or hands

WATERPROOF for 30M: Hand Wash, Rain Day, Sweating, NO Problem. In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming. (Please DONOT PULL OUT the button under water)
Luxury simple design watch, perfect gift with cleaning cloth for men
description: 100% Brand New and High Quality Full Functional Chronograph Time, Date, Chronograph Function Movement Type: Quartz Clasp Type: Buckle Water Resistance: 3ATM Dial Window Material: Scratch Proof Mineral Glass Watchband Material: leather Watch Case Material: Stainless Steel Watch Case Diameter: approx 42mm (1.57") Watch Case Thickness: approx 12mm (0.47") Watch Band Width: approx 22mm (0.79") Please DONOT wear this watch when diving. If mist or droplets found inside watch surface, please contact manufacturer immediately for maintenance to prevent moisture corrosion of the internal components.
